name: Ace of the Skies
description:
I made this game alongside Mete Russo (find his works at: )

This is an on-rails side-scroller shooter game, where your score at the end is decided by the cummulative colateral damage inflicted. You can destroy planes in the air to lead to a domino effect, which would destroy anything below it for higher scores.

This game was designed in one week and won the MDX Game Jam Autumn 2022 at our university.

Mete Russo - Lead Game Designer
Tarik Clavier - Assistant Game Designer & Audio Designer
